name: Wrath of the Gentle Man (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
name_original: Wrath of the Gentle Man (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
description:
Wrath of the Gentle Man is a top-down action game where you try to keep your cool, despite the invaders wrecking your home!

If you stay calm, you can dodge your enemies' attacks and trick them into destroying each other.  However, if your rage builds too high, you'll become dangerous, not just to the invaders, but to the very possessions you're trying to protect!

This is the Week 2 entry into my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  Follow me on Twitter for daily updates, or learn about the rules to the challenge here.
